00043                 float currpos = 0;

00085                 {

00162                 Player()
00163                 {
00164                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Thread.GetDomain()");
00165                         AppDomain ad = Thread.GetDomain();
00166 
00167                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoadFrom(" + System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() + @"\play_fmod.dll" + ")");
00168                         Assembly a = Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoadFrom(System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() + @"\play_fmod.dll");
00169 
00170                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("ad.Load("+a.FullName+")");
00171                         a = ad.Load(a.FullName);
00172 
00173                         foreach (Type t in a.GetTypes())
00174                         {
00175                                 List<Type> interfaces = new List<Type>(t.GetInterfaces());
00176                                 if (interfaces.Contains(typeof(IPlayer)))
00177                                 {
00178                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("Found FMOD plug-in: " + t.FullName);
00179                                         _playerFMOD = (IPlayer)ad.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap(a.FullName, t.FullName);
00180                                 }
00181                         }
00182 
00183                         // Bekannter Bug bei DirectX: Laden eines Videos verursacht LoaderLock Exception.
00184                         // Bitte unter Debug-->Exceptions-->ManagedDebuggingAsssistants den Haken bei "LoaderLock" entfernen.
00185                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("new play_video()");
00186                         _playerVideo = new play_video();
00187 
00188                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("new play_pic()");
00189                         _playerPic = new play_pic();
00190 
00191                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("_playerFMOD.setFadeTime()");
00192                         int ft = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime;
00193                         _playerFMOD.setFadetime(ft);
00194                 }
00195 
00200                 public void open(ref Media file)
00201                 {
00202                         if (file == null) return;
00203 
00204                         IPlayer oldPlayer = _player;
00205 
00206                         if (file.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00207                         {
00208                                 switch (file.Type)
00209                                 {
00210                                         case Media.MediaType.Audio:
00211                                                 _player = _playerFMOD;
00212                                                 Program.gui.setViewmode(Viewmode.Playlist);
00213                                                 break;
00214                                         case Media.MediaType.Picture:
00215                                                 _player = _playerPic;
00216                                                 Program.gui.setViewmode(Viewmode.Picture);
00217                                                 break;
00218                                         case Media.MediaType.Video:
00219                                                 _player = _playerVideo;
00220                                                 Program.gui.setViewmode(Viewmode.Video);
00221                                                 break;
00222                                         case Media.MediaType.Unknown:
00223                                                 _player = null;
00224                                                 break;
00225                                 }
00226                         }
00227                         else
00228                         {
00229                                 _player = _playerFMOD;
00230                         }
00231 
00232                         if (oldPlayer != _player && oldPlayer != null)
00233                                 oldPlayer.stop();
00234 
00235                         try
00236                         {
00237                         if (_player != null)
00238                                 try
00239                                 {
00240                                         _player.open(ref file);
00241                                 }
00242                                 catch (InvalidOperationException ie)
00243                                 {
00244                                         throw ie;
00245                                 }
00246                 }
00247                         catch (System.Net.WebException w)
00248                         {
00249                                 throw w;
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252 
00256                 public void play()
00257                 {
00258                         if (_player != null)
00259                         {
00260                                 _playing = true;
00261                                 _player.play();
00262                                 _player.setVolume(globalvolume);
00263                                 Program.gui.onMediaChanged();
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266 
00270                 public void stop()
00271                 {
00272                         if (_player != null)
00273                         {
00274                                 _playing = false;
00275                                 _player.stop();
00276                         }
00277                 }

00282                 public bool togglePause()
00283                 {
00284                         if (_player != null)
00285                         {
00286                                 _playing = !_playing;
00287                                 return (Paused = !Paused);
00288                         }
00289 
00290                         return false;
00291                 }
00292 
00296                 public bool toggleMute()
00297                 {
00298                         return (Muted = !Muted);
00299                 }

00304                 public bool toggleCrossfade()
00305                 {
00306                         return (Crossfading = !Crossfading);
00307                 }

00312                 public void tick()
00313                 {
00314                         if (_player == null) return;
00315 
00316                         if (!isPlaying)
00317                         {
00318                                 currpos = 0;
00319                                 return;
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         _player.tick();
00323 
00324                         float tmppos = Player.Instance.Position;
00325 
00326                         /*Medium zu Ende*/
00327                         if (tmppos < currpos)
00328                         {
00329                                 if (!mediaChangeIntended && !isFading && Playlist.Instance.next() != -1)
00330                                 {
00331                                         Playlist.Instance.Cursor = Playlist.Instance.next();
00332 
00333                                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00334                                         if (tmp != null)
00335                                         {
00336                                                 try
00337                                                 {
00338                                                         this.open(ref tmp);
00339                                                         this.play();
00340                                                 }
00341                                                 catch (System.Net.WebException w)
00342                                                 {
00343                                                         throw w;
00344                                                 }
00345                                                 catch (InvalidOperationException ie)
00346                                                 {
00347                                                         throw ie;
00348                                                 }
00349                                         }
00350                                 }
00351 
00352                                 mediaChangeIntended = false;
00353                         }
00354 
00355                         currpos = tmppos;
00356                 }
00357
